item.description:
A lot of people have asked about finding an indoor space with the weather getting colder and all. One member had suggested a place (thank you!) that had mentioned being open to this: "Cause to Paws" -- a cute little dog boutique in Coolidge Corner in Brookline. I just went there and talked to them, and they'd be happy to let us have a meetup there as a trial -- and if it works out, it could be our winter place. OR if the location isn't good for everyone, maybe we could find another place outside of Boston and alternate.

We need to do it off regular store hours -- so the time that worked best was Sunday at 11am. The poll showed that Sunday was the preferred day, so hopefully this is better for everyone anyway.

The Web site to the location is www.causetopaws.com. There is a map there. Also, there is a parking lot on Center Street just near there for those that drive. For T-ers, it's the C line, Winchester stop, then walk a blockish towards the center of Coolidge Corner.

It's a cute place. Of course I walked out with some chihuahua couture as well! And a free treat sample that the dogs LOVED.

Let's see how this works this weekend and go from there.
item.name: Boston Chihuahua November Indoor Meetup
